thread.title: Barkley, Shaq yell at each other over LeBron
thread.title_full: Barkley, Shaq yell at each other over LeBron

author: USA TODAY
title: Barkley, Shaq yell at each other over LeBron
text:
Barkley, Shaq yell at each other over LeBron It got pretty heated. Post to Facebook Barkley, Shaq yell at each other over LeBron It got pretty heated.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/lebron-james-cleveland-cavaliers-charles-barkley-shaq-nba-on-tnt-argument-video/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Barkley, Shaq yell at each other over LeBron Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 10:11 a.m. ET Jan. 27, 2017 13 Shares 
Feb 16, 2013; Houston, TX, USA; TNT broadcaster Shaquille O'Neal (left) and Charles Barkley talk during the 2013 NBA All-Star slam dunk contest at the Toyota Center. Mandatory Credit: Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports ORG XMIT: USATSI-128540 ORIG FILE ID: 20130216_ajl_sd2_142.jpg (Photo: USA TODAY Sports) 
LeBron James' expletive-filled ranting aimed at the Cleveland Cavaliers' front office has the NBA on TNT crew seeing red. 
Shaquille O'Neal called James's approach "inappropriate" because he took his complaints public before Charles Barkley said the superstar should be just fine with Kyrie Irving and Kevin Love. Shaq threw out to Barkley that he knows nothing about winning back-to-back rings, and things got a little loud in the studio: The TNT crew has a heated discussion surrounding LeBron James' recent comments üòÅ pic.twitter.com/YbsmP8LWxP ‚Äî NBA on TNT (@NBAonTNT) January 27, 2017 
Barkley added this: 
"This ain't like a 7-Eleven you can just go in and buy anything. They're trying to make trades ‚Ä¶ they've got the highest payroll in the league, they're paying $40-50 million in luxury taxes." 
Ultimately, the entire group seemed to agree James going public was the wrong approach, but LeBron is a sensitive subject even after winning a ring in an incredible comeback effort.
